> -----Original Message-----
> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...] 
> Sent: Tuesday, March 02, 2004 7:43 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Junitreport runs out of memory.
> 
> 
> Ray Tayek wrote:
> 
> > Hi, tring to run the junit tests for hibernate. When I turn on debug 
> > logging, I get an out of memory error.  ...
> > 
> > Does anyone know of a workaround.
> 
> This happens when there is a lot of console output. One hack 
> is to use 
> the "noframes" stylesheet, ...
> 
> Another workaround would be to redirect debug logging away 
> from stdout  ...
> This might also be a Xalan defect. ...

Great ideas, I will try them

Thanks for your prompt assistance.
